players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We should vote her out today."
Charlie: "I trust Bob's investigation. Diana is mafia, let's vote her out."
Diana: "I am the detective and I investigated Bob last night. He is the mafioso trying to frame me. Don't believe him!"
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. Diana is innocent."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Diana and she is mafia. Charlie is lying about being detective - there is only one detective in this game."

Diana: "Charlie, you just claimed detective but Bob already did. There's only one detective, so one of you is lying. Bob investigated me and said I'm mafia, but I'm the real detective who investigated Bob and found he's mafia. Charlie must be the..."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
